text: David gaa hana ga heetugi gi digaula, ga helekai “Maa goodou e loomoi be nia hoo hagatenetene belee hagamaamaa au, au ga hagaahi mai goodou, ga hagapuni mai gi gimaadou! Gei maa goodou e hai di godou maanadu belee wanga au gi ogu hagadaumee, ma e aha maa au digi hagamada belee hagahuaidu goodou, di God o tadau maadua mmaadua ga iloo ga hagaduadua goodou.”
